feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Taskbar height and icon size 1.3.1
entry.content:
• Fixed the mod for some Windows 11 builds which don't yet have the small icons option.
  • Fixed an incorrect width of the start button in some cases.

entry.title: Taskbar height and icon size 1.3
entry.content:
• Added support for newer Windows 11 builds with support for smaller taskbar icons. For the newer builds, on Settings > Personalization > Taskbar, the “Taskbar behaviors” settings now include the “Show smaller taskbar buttons” option. If the option is available, the mod is now able to customize both the large icons and the small icons.
  • Improved compatibility with status bar programs such as YASB and Zebar.
  • Improved the quality of small 16x16 icons.
  • Fixed sizing of the search button in recent Windows 11 builds.

entry.title: Volume HID Sendeer 0.1
entry.content:
Volume HID Sender

This mod allows you to send HID input for the MOUNTAIN EVEREST MAX keyboard everytime the volume is changed. This solution is not perfect. The volume will frequently be off by one. It is also possible to desync the volume temporarily (until next volume update) by taking a very long time to decide which volume you want.

Custom timeouts may be supported in the future

Arbritary HID output will be supported in the future

Requires HID HIDApiTester.

Getting started

First get HIDAPITester here.

Next set the HIDApiTesterPath variable in settings to where you downloaded HIDAPITester to

Finally, Profit

Special Thanks

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4559526/how-do-i-tell-if-the-master-volume-is-muted

https://github.com/todbot/hidapitester

entry.title: No Properties Icon 1.0.1
entry.content: • Fix calling convention

entry.title: Legacy Shell Message Boxes 1.0.1
entry.content: • Fix string format

entry.title: Legacy Shell Message Boxes 1.0.0
entry.content:
Legacy Shell Message Boxes

This mod makes message boxes opened by the ShellMessageBox API use regular message boxes like in Windows XP and before instead of task dialogs, like they do in Windows Vista and later.

Before:

After:

entry.title: No Properties Icon 1.0
entry.content:
No Properties Icon

Removes the window icon from property sheets like previous Windows versions.

entry.title: Translucent Windows 1.5.1
entry.content:
• Libraries are now loaded with the LOADLIBRARYSEARCH_SYSTEM32 flag to prevent malicious or accidental dll hijacking. https://github.com/ramensoftware/windhawk-mods/issues/2063
  • Fixed issue with the accent color not being the correct color in some programs, e.g. snippingtool.exe.
  • Fixed a bug with system colors not being applied and unloaded correctly.
  • Added logs.

entry.title: Classic Start Menu Folders Icon 1.0.2
entry.content: • Fix IconFile desktop.ini check

entry.title: UIFILE Override 1.0.3
entry.content:
• Use LoadLibraryEx with LOADLIBRARYSEARCH_SYSTEM32 #2063
  • Code cleanup

entry.title: Cycle through taskbar windows on click 1.1.4
entry.content: • Fixed an incompatibility with recent Windows 11 updates.

entry.title: Better file sizes in Explorer details 1.4.11
entry.content: • Undid the Everything v1.4 fix from the previous version which was incorrect.

entry.title: Titlebar For Everyone 0.2
entry.content:
• Fix removing all client edges of enabled apps, including child controls
  • Fix Brave being invisible
  • Add an option to force enable or disable the window client edge in enabled apps
  • Add an option to hide Steam's tool windows
  • Add support for Qt apps

entry.title: Clientedge Everywhere 1.4.0
entry.content: The issue with Regedit was caused by another mod, whose fixed version is to be submitted soon. As such, it is not needed anymore.

entry.title: Favorites in Navigation Pane 1.0.2
entry.content: • Use LoadLibraryEx with LOADLIBRARYSEARCH_SYSTEM32 #2063

entry.title: Better file sizes in Explorer details 1.4.10
entry.content:
• Fixed querying Everything v1.4 when custom macros named "folder" or "wfn" are configured.
  • Fixed querying Everything v1.5 when the alpha_instance option is set to false.
  • Libraries are now loaded with the LOAD_LIBRARY_SEARCH_SYSTEM32 flag to prevent malicious or accidental dll hijacking.
  • Excluded the search menu process due to a reported incompatibility which is still being investigated. Several other processes, such as the start menu and the lock screen, were excluded as well. These processes never use the explorer details control, so this mod isn't useful for them anyway.

entry.title: Classic Start Menu Folders Icon 1.0.1
entry.content:
• Use LoadLibraryEx with LOADLIBRARYSEARCH_SYSTEM32 #2063
  • Fix 32-bit symbols
  • Code cleanup

entry.title: Classic theme transparency fix 1.1
entry.content: Fix LoadLibrary https://github.com/ramensoftware/windhawk-mods/issues/2063

entry.title: Fix Classic Theme Maximized Windows 2.2
entry.content: • LoadLibrary -> LoadLibraryEx limited to System32 for UxTheme load

entry.title: Resource Redirect 1.2.1
entry.content: • Fixed an error when launching programs without a visual style manifest.
